Sentencas: By screening a series of La0.5Sr0.5MnO3-d (LSM)-La0.5Sr0.5FeO3-d (LSF) solid solutions using first-principles calculations, an optimal solid solution of LSM and LSF was chosen as the cathode for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (H-SOFCs).
Titulo: Rational modification of traditional La0.5Sr0.5(Fe/Mn)O3 cathodes for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells: Inspiration from nature

Sentencas: In terms of oxygen vacancy formation energy, O-2 adsorption energy, bond length of adsorbed O-2, and O p-band center, La0.5Sr0.5Mn0.875Fe0.125O3 (LSMF125) and La0.5Sr0.5Mn25Fe0.75O3 (LSMF75) exhibited superior properties.
Titulo: Rational modification of traditional La0.5Sr0.5(Fe/Mn)O3 cathodes for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells: Inspiration from nature

Sentencas: Subsequent experimental investigations revealed that the H-SOFC with the LSMF75 cathode performed better than the cell with the LSMF125 cathode.
Titulo: Rational modification of traditional La0.5Sr0.5(Fe/Mn)O3 cathodes for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells: Inspiration from nature

Sentencas: The structure analysis revealed that LSMF75 has both Mn and Fe cations on its surface, similar to the designs of several naturally occurring enzymes, hence the increased cathode activity.
Titulo: Rational modification of traditional La0.5Sr0.5(Fe/Mn)O3 cathodes for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells: Inspiration from nature

Sentencas: By improving the LSMF75 cathode further, the cell utilizing the LSMF75 cathode attained a peak power density of 1238 mW cm(-2) at 700 C-?, which was much greater than that of the cells using the LSM or LSF cathodes, illustrating the benefits of using the LSM-LSF solid solution.
Titulo: Rational modification of traditional La0.5Sr0.5(Fe/Mn)O3 cathodes for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells: Inspiration from nature

Sentencas: Additionally, the good chemical stability of the LSMF75 cathode was maintained, allowing for 150 h of stable operation under operational conditions.
Titulo: Rational modification of traditional La0.5Sr0.5(Fe/Mn)O3 cathodes for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells: Inspiration from nature
